div.p: Determination of Critical Infrastructure Workers and Essential Employees Performing Necessary Government Activities: The Berkley Schools notice of critical workers is posted on our COVID-19 website.

Stay healthy, stay home, keep learning, and don't forget to physical distance from one another.
